General.Name: Absci Corp
General.Description: Absci Corporation operates as a generative AI drug creation company in the United States. Its integrated drug creation platform identifies novel drug targets and creates biotherapeutic candidates. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Washington.
General.Address: 18105 SE Mill Plain Boulevard, Vancouver, WA, United States, 98683
